title: Cactus armor
summaries: Cactus armor is an early-game set of armor which can be crafted with 75 Cactus.

On <linked>[img:Old-gen console version]</linked><linked> Old-gen console</linked> and <linked>3DS</linked><linked>[img:Nintendo 3DS version]</linked>, its set bonus grants an extra 1 defense. On <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile</linked>, it instead provides a <linked>thorns</linked> effect, dealing 15 / <linked>30</linked> / <linked>45</linked> damage and inflicting a <linked>knockback</linked> of 10 (Extremely strong) on <linked>enemies</linked> that come into contact with the wearer.

statistics.Set Bonus: Attackers take damage from the cactus spines
statistics.Sell: 150 (set)
